name: Broken Rime's Echo
description:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Cryo Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character uses a Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo Die</color>. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character uses a Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo Die</color>. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytitle: Icy Song, Distant Realm: Broken Rime's Echo
storytext: "Past the ice-sealed door, walking down the corridors to the depths, he will break off a branch of silver-white, and bring hope to the snowy land."
